hero_section.main_headline: Expert HVAC Solutions for Perfect Indoor Comfort
hero_section.sub_headline: 24/7 Emergency Service • Licensed & Insured • Serving DMV Since 2010
hero_section.description: From emergency repairs to energy-efficient installations, Diaz Airflow Solutions Inc. delivers superior HVAC services that keep your home and business comfortable year-round.

services.name: Air Conditioning Installation
services.short_description: Professional AC installation with energy-efficient systems
services.full_description: Our certified technicians provide expert installation of high-efficiency air conditioning systems. We perform detailed load calculations, recommend the perfect system for your space, and ensure proper installation for maximum efficiency and longevity.

services.name: Air Conditioner Repair
services.full_description: When your AC breaks down, we're here to help. Our experienced technicians diagnose and repair all makes and models quickly and efficiently. We carry common parts in our service vehicles for faster repairs.

services.name: Heating Installation
services.short_description: Efficient heating systems for Maryland winters
services.full_description: Stay warm all winter with our professional heating installation services. We install high-efficiency furnaces, heat pumps, and hybrid systems designed to provide reliable comfort while minimizing energy costs.

services.name: Heating Repair
services.short_description: Emergency heating repair when you need it most
services.full_description: Don't let a broken heater leave you in the cold. Our heating repair experts are available 24/7 to diagnose and fix any heating system issue, ensuring your family stays warm and comfortable.

services.name: HVAC Maintenance
services.full_description: Regular maintenance is key to system longevity and efficiency. Our comprehensive maintenance programs include seasonal tune-ups, priority service, and discounts on repairs.

services.name: Indoor Air Quality
services.short_description: Clean, healthy air for your family
services.full_description: Improve your indoor air quality with our comprehensive solutions including air purifiers, humidifiers, UV lights, and duct cleaning services. Breathe easier and live healthier.

testimonials.name: Michael Thompson
testimonials.text: Diaz Airflow Solutions Inc. saved our summer! When our AC died during a heatwave, they arrived within 2 hours and had us cool again by evening. Professional, fair pricing, and excellent work.

testimonials.name: Sarah Martinez
testimonials.text: We manage 12 properties and exclusively use Diaz for all HVAC needs. They're reliable, professional, and their maintenance program has reduced our emergency calls by 70%. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: David Chen
testimonials.text: They installed a complete HVAC system in our new restaurant. The team worked around our schedule, finished on time, and the system works perfectly. Great attention to detail and very knowledgeable.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Williams
testimonials.text: After getting quotes from 5 companies, we chose Diaz for our new heat pump installation. Best decision ever! They were the most thorough, honest, and their price was very competitive.

testimonials.name: Robert Johnson
testimonials.text: Our office AC wasn't cooling properly. Diaz diagnosed the issue quickly, explained everything clearly, and fixed it at a fair price. They even followed up a week later to ensure everything was working well.

testimonials.name: Maria Rodriguez
testimonials.text: The technician was incredibly knowledgeable and patient with my questions. He explained the maintenance process, showed me how to change filters, and gave tips for better efficiency. Excellent service!

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency service?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide 24/7 emergency HVAC service throughout the DMV area. Our emergency response team typically arrives within 2 hours for urgent heating and cooling issues.

faqs.question: What brands do you service?
faqs.answer: We service all major HVAC brands including Carrier, Trane, Lennox, Rheem, Goodman, York, Bryant, American Standard, and more. Our technicians are factory-trained and certified.

faqs.question: Do you offer financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer flexible financing options for new HVAC installations with approved credit. We have plans with 0% interest for qualified customers and terms up to 10 years.

faqs.question: How often should I service my HVAC system?
faqs.answer: We recommend bi-annual maintenance - once in spring for your AC and once in fall for your heating system. Regular maintenance extends equipment life and prevents unexpected breakdowns.

faqs.question: What's included in your maintenance plan?
faqs.answer: Our maintenance plan includes two annual tune-ups, priority emergency service, 15% discount on repairs, no overtime charges, filter replacements, and a comprehensive 25-point inspection.

faqs.question: How long do HVAC systems typically last?
faqs.answer: With proper maintenance, air conditioners and heat pumps typically last 12-15 years, while furnaces can last 15-20 years. Regular maintenance can extend these lifespans significantly.

faqs.question: Do you offer free estimates?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide free in-home estimates for all new HVAC installations. For repairs, we offer free diagnostics when you approve the repair.

faqs.question: Are your technicians certified?
faqs.answer: All our technicians are EPA certified, NATE certified, and undergo continuous training. They're also background-checked, drug-tested, and fully insured for your peace of mind.
